name: nataC fo sreltteS
description:
nataC fo sreltteS

Establish your colony and create the largest civilization. Compete to be fastest to expand your new kingdom gaining recourses and territory along the way. 

A multiplayer board game that involves resource management and city expansion.  Based on the game Settlers of Catan.

Game was made as a class project.

Features:

  • LAN Multiplayer for 2-4 players
  • Territory acquisition and expansion
  • Resource trading
